name: shipyard-pocketbase-template
description: Template repository for Shipyard + PocketBase applications

scripts.dev: npm run dockerWithPorts npm run dev:bare
scripts.docker:reset-test-db: docker compose down pocketbase-test && docker volume rm -f levino-todo-app_pb_data_test && docker compose up -d pocketbase-test && sleep 2
scripts.docker:test: npm run docker:reset-test-db && docker compose run --rm -e POCKETBASE_URL=http://pocketbase-test:8090 runner
scripts.test:playwright: npm run docker:e2e npm run test:playwright:bare
scripts.test: npm run docker:test npm run test:bare
